remarks: Principle of Transfinite Recursion, part 3 of 3.  Theorem 7.41(3) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 47.  Finally, we show that ` F ` is unique.  We do this by showing that any class ` B ` with the same properties of ` F ` that we showed in parts 1 and 2 is identical to ` F ` .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
